name: Frozen Pet Pop Mania - Crush the Diamonds and Smash the Jewels FREE
name_original: Frozen Pet Pop Mania - Crush the Diamonds and Smash the Jewels FREE
description:
Pet Pop Mania Ice is a classic and one of the best match-3 games available on the store with gorgeous and surreal graphics and amazing gameplay.The main characters of the game are little puppy and pets that you need to match by color and you will gain diamonds and jewels for that!Collect Animal heroes candy and match them to finish the frozen games.Match 3 or more of the same wildlife to rescue pet mania & win the saga.You will enjoy a icy and frozen environment to play with arctic creatures and monsters.The Baby panda pets are waiting for you to rescue them all!The evil caterpillar and bear are looking to destroy all your diamonds and steal all of your jewel!Beat the Evil Gorilla which is the number one emperor of the jungle crush saga game!

How To Play
- Switch and match animals in a group of three or more to create similar combo like fruit connect or fruit link!
- Rescue the pet and the baby panda will give you bonuses.
- Over 100+ levels available in this special farm adventure in wonderland and a beautiful puppy games!
- Crush the candy with a little tap and create free fall with frozen splash!
- Icy Sweet jelly & candy and animals!
- Grow and harvest the most delicious organic crops for your animals
- Plant,harvest and process the farm and get extra gems!
- Protect your farm full of puppies and do not let the evil bear to take over the match 3 game!
- Harvest to the next level the little farm world and experience more!
- New ice game which is updated every week such as crush pop and puzzle bubble!
- Rescue the animals in our jungle jam game!
- Defeat the mighty snow lion with strategic match 3 moves!
- Pop the Panda item to create icy and slippery floor!
- Join today our pets on their happy journey through the wonderland world of wildlife and zoo or pet care.
- Take care of your exotic animals including the leopards,zebras,tigers,koala,crocodile and panda in your zoo.
- Multiple goals, move mode, time mode, collect mode which you will have to finish in this mysterious jungle environment!
- Similar physics like pet line and pet connect games or pet care which are very interesting for little kids and toddlers!
- Connect the pets between them to create blasters and play your way in this adorable pet world!
- One of the few pet games for free out there which has dogs,cats,pony and other cool night creatures!
